title: World of Marvel Characters
description: In the Marvel universe, there is a single world where all the comic book characters live. The best way to know about comic book characters is to read comics. All you have to do is get the best comics of a character you are interested in and read it. However, because we all don't have the actual time to read each story and learn about each character, you can search and learn some quick facts. You can start by learning about Marvel's top characters!
